author: slava77
body:
this was motivated by inspection of `SiStripRecHitConverterAlgorithm` in the HLT context (runs without matching; expected to be used in HLT in combination with mkFit)

initially, the cost of `shrink_to_fit` was the concern (5% of the converter). After adding reserve the overall speedup of `SiStripRecHitConverter::produce` is 14% (relative), which apparently benefits also from lack of reallocations.

No changes are expected

@cms-sw/tracking-pog-l2 @cms-sw/trk-dpg-l2
title: speedup SiStripRecHitConverterAlgorithm by reserving the output size
